channel.title: CVE Feed for Broadstreet XPRESS -- WordPress Ad Widget
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Broadstreet XPRESS -- WordPress Ad Widget

item.title: CVE-2024-33696|2024-04-26T12:41:18.749Z -- Broadstreet XPRESS -- WordPress Ad Widget
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Broadstreet XPRESS WordPress Ad Widget allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WordPress Ad Widget: from n/a through 2.20.0.
